columns.description: The `INCLUDE_BILL` column in the `SD_BILLING_TAX_T` table is a nullable bit (boolean) column that indicates whether the corresponding tax should be included in the billing or not. This column likely serves as a flag or switch to control the inclusion or exclusion of specific tax calculations during the sales billing process.
